member.name: T:LinkedIn.Api.Client.Owin.LinkedInApiClient
member.summary: Represents the context for calling OAuth-based REST APIs of LinkedIn.

member.name: M:LinkedIn.Api.Client.Owin.LinkedInApiClient.#ctor(Microsoft.Owin.IOwinRequest,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: The object which is used by the context to send REST-based requests to LinkedIn API server.
The access token of the user on whose behalf the context can be used to make REST calls.

member.name: M:LinkedIn.Api.Client.Owin.LinkedInApiClient.ExecuteAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Executes a LinkedIn REST API call.
member.returns: Returns the result of the API call as an instance of the class.

member.name: M:LinkedIn.Api.Client.Owin.LinkedInApiClient.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the resources of the context.
